description:
Creation of a digital currency accepted by independent craft breweries in exchange for beer. Funds raised from issuing the tokens are invested into new and expanding craft breweries, increasing demand for the currency and providing a return to the Craft Coin Company Ltd.

The Craft Beer Coin is a transactional, asset-backed cryptocurrency that enables fresh local beer purchase via the holders' smart phone. A coin is always underwritten by at least one pint of beer.
name: Craft Beer Coin
